alert.note: Alert for Coastal Charlotte; Coastal Lee; Coastal Sarasota; DeSoto; Inland Charlotte; Inland Lee; Inland Manatee; Inland Sarasota (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 07 at 4:35PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Manatee, Charlotte, southern DeSoto, northern Lee and Sarasota Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 434 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southwest of Port Charlotte, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cape Coral, North Port, Punta Gorda, Arcadia, Port Charlotte, Babcock Webb Wma, Southeast Arcadia, Myakka River State Park, Babcock Ranch, Charleston Park, Olga, Charlotte County Airport, Gulf Gate Estates, Palmona Park, Buckingham, Burnt Store Marina, Murdock, Nocatee, Vamo and El Jobean. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Charlotte; Coastal Lee; Coastal Sarasota; DeSoto; Inland Charlotte; Inland Lee; Inland Manatee; Inland Sarasota
